div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1079 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1948 Burial: c. 300-250 B.C. Contents: 19 AE. In ancient pit in room in agora Olbia: 12 fish-shaped AE 6 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 8 [1], 13-14 [2], 22 [1], 26-29 [2]) Unc.: 1 AE Disposition: Kiev Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
